properties.name: Baryte deposit, Zarrin Rural District, Kharanaq District, Ardakan County, Yazd Province, Iran
properties.description:
Baryte deposit, Zarrin Rural District, Kharanaq District, Ardakan County, Yazd Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran

Carbonate-hosted baryte ore. The Ardakan barite deposit is located in the central part of the Yazd Block. The area of the Ardakan barite deposit is a highly tectonized and faulted terrane. The discovery of the Ardakan barite deposit apparently dates b...
